title: As Oil Prices Slide, Speculation Rises On Shale Boom's Sustainability
teaser: Global oil prices have fallen to a 4-year low, confirming hopes and fears, depending on if you're a gasoline consumer or an oilman, that abundant U.S. crude is messing with the world's energy order.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
